name: BLAST FLOCK
description:
!!! CONTROL LOTS OF PLANES !!!

!!! DESTROY LOTS OF PLANES !!!

!!! SAVE THOSE YOU CAN SAVE !!!

All the controls are on the mouse! You can try eating a sandwich while playing the game with the other hand, that is technically possible but you might not do super good at the game.
